snippet: Mr. Maetzig, a pioneering figure in East Germany’s socialist film industry after World War II, helped postwar Germany come to terms with its Nazi past.
abstract: Kurt Maetzig, a pioneering East German director whose socialist films scrutinized anti-Semitism and helped compel Germans to come to terms with their Nazi past, dies at age 101.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Maetzig, a pioneering figure in East Germany’s socialist film industry after World War II, helped postwar Germany come to terms with its Nazi past.

headline.seo: Kurt Maetzig, German Film Director, Is Dead at 101
headline.main: Kurt Maetzig, Pioneering German Director, Dies at 101
headline.print_headline: Kurt Maetzig, Pioneering German Director, Dies at 101
